title.narrative: Conflict Technical Capacity and Training Task Order

description.narrative: The purpose of the Task Order is to procure technical capacity building and training services in an effort to extend access to USAID's state-of-the-art conflict technical capacity building and training materials (participant manuals, facilitator manuals, videos, etc.) for a broader range in the development, humanitarian assistance, and academic communities while also enhancing and expanding course offerings for USAID staff.
